about_the_game:
PACK MY STUFF is an engaging puzzle and hidden object game. Your task is to locate and pack all the objects in the room into boxes. It's a simple concept, but incredibly enjoyable. As a dedicated employee of a moving company, you'll assist the residents of Neuberg in their relocation by carefully packing their belongings into moving boxes. Immerse yourself in a vibrant and refreshing click game that offers an idyllic experience. Take a break from the demands of everyday life and enjoy a few relaxing rounds of PACK MY STUFF.





As an employee of a moving company, you play a vital role in helping the residents of Neuberg pack their cherished belongings. Uncover new secrets and treasures along the way, while documenting your own journey in a personal diary. Immerse yourself in the captivating world of PACK MY STUFF, set in a charming small town in America.



The controls in PACK MY STUFF are simple and easy to learn, allowing you to dive right into the fun. Your objective is to pack all the items in each level to successfully complete it. Don't forget to stay vigilant for hidden treasures and secrets throughout your journey. With a wide range of locations to explore, from cozy family homes to sprawling warehouses, you'll have plenty of variety. Discover the essence of middle-class American homes and assist in packing up small and large corporate offices, all while immersing yourself in your own unique story.



You like it hard! [/b]
then use our hard mode where you have no help.


Welcome to Newhill, a picturesque American dream town where dreams come to life. Join us in helping the residents pack up their belongings, paving the way for a seamless transition into their new apartment. Be a part of their journey and make their dream move a reality.

Cool new Box Skins to earn

Features:


  • Experience a simple and yet fun gameplay

  • Pack all objects on the map ei negla bo tables or PCs.

  • Visits place like family homes, offices, warehouses, gardens and much more

  • Find our Secrets and unlock achievements

name: PACK MY STUFF

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card

short_description: Unleash the fun with PACK MY STUFF! Discover and pack objects into boxes in this exciting puzzle and hidden object game. As a mover in Neuberg, assist residents in packing their possessions. Enjoy the simplicity and thrill!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
